UniprotID	A0A8V8TP06
Accession	A0A8V8TP06
EntryName	A0A8V8TP06_HUMAN
ProteinName	Sidoreflexin
GeneName	SFXN3
Length	325
Function	Mitochondrial serine transporter that mediates transport of serine into mitochondria, an important step of the one-carbon metabolism pathway. Mitochondrial serine is converted to glycine and formate, which then exits to the cytosol where it is used to generate the charged folates that serve as one-carbon donors.
Subcellular Location	Mitochondrion membrane
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility	
SecondStructure	
Hydropathy
